summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account during December 2013. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, indicating a significant transfer of funds within the month.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact person for assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Transfer of Funds
events.description: A transfer of $300,000.00 was made into the account.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $452,921.98 as of December 1, 2013.
A total of $300,000.00 was deposited into the account on December 13, 2013.
The ending balance as of December 31, 2013, was $352,921.98.
There were no service charges or fees incurred during this statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
